rules_text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
Fernic, Vault Keeper can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
If a card in your graveyard would be exiled, put it on the bottom of your library instead.
{W}{B}{G}:Transform Fernic, Vault Keeper. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
rules_text2:
During each of your turns, you may cast a historic card from your graveyard. As a additional cost to cast those spells, pay 3 life. [i](Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)[/i]
{GW}{BG}: Transform Soul Stump Vault. Activate only as a sorcery.
_
